movie_title: Artificial Intelligence - what can and can't it do? 6 Minute English
introduction: Learn English vocabulary and improve your listening skills as we teach you about computers and techn

vocabulary.definition: a set of steps a computer follows in order to solve a problem
vocabulary.example: Google changes its search algorithm hundreds of times every year.

vocabulary.definition: a limit on what something can do or how good it can be
vocabulary.example: Our show has certain limitations - for example, it's only six minutes long!

vocabulary.definition: to not realize the importance of something
vocabulary.example: We take our smartphones for granted these days, but before 1995 hardly anyone owned one.

vocabulary.definition: to perform a task or take action
vocabulary.example: Neil implemented some changes to the show.

vocabulary.definition: a guess based on knowledge and experience
vocabulary.example: Tim's educated guess on the chess computer's name was correct.
